<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <title>QA Logger Viewer</title>
    <style>
        body { font-family: Arial; background:#f5f5f5; padding:20px; }
        .log-box { background:#fff; padding:15px; margin-bottom:20px; border-radius:6px; }
        pre { background:#111; color:#0f0; padding:10px; overflow:auto; }
        textarea { width:100%; height:60px; }
        button { padding:6px 12px; margin-top:5px; }
        select { padding:4px; margin-bottom:10px; }
    </style>
</head>
<body>

<h1>QA Logger/Viewer</h1>

<form method="POST" style="margin-bottom:15px;">
    <button
        type="submit"
        name="new_session"
        onclick="return confirm('Start a new logging session? This will reset iteration count.');"
        style="
            background:#000000;
            color:white;
            border:none;
            padding:8px 14px;
            border-radius:4px;
            cursor:pointer;
        ">
        Start New Session
    </button>
</form>




<div style="margin-bottom:15px;color:#555;">
Current iteration count:
<strong>15</strong>
|
Logging status:
<strong>ACTIVE</strong>
</div>


<form method="GET">
    <label for="iteration">Select Iteration:</label>
    <select name="iteration" id="iteration" onchange="this.form.submit()">
                <option value="1" >
            1        </option>
                <option value="2" >
            2        </option>
                <option value="3" >
            3        </option>
                <option value="4" >
            4        </option>
                <option value="5" >
            5        </option>
                <option value="6" >
            6        </option>
                <option value="7" >
            7        </option>
                <option value="8" >
            8        </option>
                <option value="9" >
            9        </option>
                <option value="10" >
            10        </option>
                <option value="11" >
            11        </option>
                <option value="12" >
            12        </option>
                <option value="13" >
            13        </option>
                <option value="14" >
            14        </option>
                <option value="15" selected>
            15        </option>
            </select>
</form>



<div class="log-box">
    <h3>Iteration ID: 15</h3>

    
            <div style="
        border:1px solid #ddd;
        border-radius:4px;
        padding:10px;
        margin-bottom:10px;
        background:#fafafa;
    "><strong>Type:</strong> backend-response<br><strong>Response:</strong><pre style="
            background:#f8f9fa;
            color:#212529;
            padding:12px 14px;
            margin:8px 0 12px 0;
            border-radius:6px;
            border:1px solid #dee2e6;
            font-family: Consolas, Monaco, \"Courier New\", monospace;
            font-size:13px;
            line-height:1.5;
            overflow-x:auto;
            white-space:pre-wrap;
            word-break:break-word;
        ">{
    "iteration": 14,
    "active": true
}</pre></div>            <div style="
        border:1px solid #ddd;
        border-radius:4px;
        padding:10px;
        margin-bottom:10px;
        background:#fafafa;
    "><strong>Type:</strong> backend-response<br><strong>Response:</strong><pre style="
            background:#f8f9fa;
            color:#212529;
            padding:12px 14px;
            margin:8px 0 12px 0;
            border-radius:6px;
            border:1px solid #dee2e6;
            font-family: Consolas, Monaco, \"Courier New\", monospace;
            font-size:13px;
            line-height:1.5;
            overflow-x:auto;
            white-space:pre-wrap;
            word-break:break-word;
        ">{
    "iteration": 15,
    "active": true
}</pre></div>    
    <form method="POST">
        <input type="hidden" name="iteration_id" value="15">
        <label>Remarks:</label>
        <textarea name="remark" placeholder="Enter QA remarks here..."></textarea>
        <br>
        <button type="submit">Save Remark</button>
    </form>
</div>


<hr>

<h2>Saved / Remarked Logs</h2>

<p>No remarked logs yet.</p>


<form method="GET">
    <label for="remarkSelect"><strong>Select Iteration:</strong></label>
    <select
        id="remarkSelect"
        onchange="filterRemarks(this.value)"
    >
        <option value="">-- Select Iteration --</option>

            </select>
</form>




<script>
function filterRemarks(iterationId) {
    document.querySelectorAll('.remark-item').forEach(el => {
        el.style.display =
            el.dataset.iteration === iterationId ? 'block' : 'none';
    });
}
</script>

<script>
const CURRENT_ITERATION = 15;
const LOGGING_ACTIVE = true;
</script>

<script>
let lastIteration = CURRENT_ITERATION;

// Poll every 2 seconds
if (LOGGING_ACTIVE) {
    setInterval(async () => {
        try {
            const res = await fetch('iteration_logic/logger_iteration_status.php', {
                cache: 'no-store'
            });
            const data = await res.json();

            if (data.iteration > lastIteration) {
                window.location.href =
                    '/logger/logger_index.php?iteration=' + data.iteration;
            }
        } catch (e) {
            // silently ignore
        }
    }, 2000);
}
</script>
<script>
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
    const selected = "";
    if (selected) {
        filterRemarks(selected);
    }
});
</script>

</body>

<style>
    body { font-family: Arial; background:#f5f5f5; padding:20px; }
    .log-box { background:#fff; padding:15px; margin-bottom:20px; border-radius:6px; }
    pre { background:#111; color:#0f0; padding:10px; overflow:auto; }
    textarea { width:100%; height:60px; }
    button { padding:6px 12px; margin-top:5px; }
    select { padding:4px; margin-bottom:10px; }
</style>


</html>

<body>

<h1>QA Logger/Viewer</h1>

<form method="POST" style="margin-bottom:15px;">
    <button
        type="submit"
        name="new_session"
        onclick="return confirm('Start a new logging session? This will reset iteration count.');"
        style="
            background:#000000;
            color:white;
            border:none;
            padding:8px 14px;
            border-radius:4px;
            cursor:pointer;

    </button>
</form>

</div>


<form method="GET">

            <div style="
        border:1px solid #ddd;

            background:#f8f9fa;
            color:#212529;
            padding:12px 14px;
            margin:8px 0 12px 0;
            border-radius:6px;
            border:1px solid #dee2e6;
            font-family: Consolas, Monaco, \"Courier New\", monospace;
            font-size:13px;
            line-height:1.5;
            overflow-x:auto;

    &quot;active&quot;: true
}</pre></div>            <div style="

    &quot;active&quot;: true
}</pre></div>    
    <form method="POST">
        <input type="hidden" name="iteration_id" value="15">
        <label>Remarks:</label>
        <textarea name="remark" placeholder="Enter QA remarks here..."></textarea>
        <br>
        <button type="submit">Save Remark</button>
    </form>
</div>


<hr>

<h2>Saved / Remarked Logs</h2>

<p>No remarked logs yet.</p>


<form method="GET">
    <label for="remarkSelect"><strong>Select Iteration:</strong></label>
    <select
        id="remarkSelect"
        onchange="filterRemarks(this.value)"
    >
        <option value="">-- Select Iteration --</option>

            </select>
</form>




<script>
function filterRemarks(iterationId) {
    document.querySelectorAll('.remark-item').forEach(el => {
        el.style.display =
            el.dataset.iteration === iterationId ? 'block' : 'none';
    });
}
</script>

<script>
const CURRENT_ITERATION = 15;
const LOGGING_ACTIVE = true;
</script>

<script>
let lastIteration = CURRENT_ITERATION;

// Poll every 2 seconds
if (LOGGING_ACTIVE) {
    setInterval(async () => {
        try {
            const res = await fetch('iteration_logic/logger_iteration_status.php', {
                cache: 'no-store'
            });
            const data = await res.json();

            if (data.iteration > lastIteration) {
                window.location.href =
                    '/logger/logger_index.php?iteration=' + data.iteration;
            }
        } catch (e) {
            // silently ignore
        }
    }, 2000);
}
</script>
<script>
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
    const selected = "";
    if (selected) {
        filterRemarks(selected);
    }
});
</script>

</body>

<style>
    body { font-family: Arial; background:#f5f5f5; padding:20px; }
    .log-box { background:#fff; padding:15px; margin-bottom:20px; border-radius:6px; }
    pre { background:#111; color:#0f0; padding:10px; overflow:auto; }
    textarea { width:100%; height:60px; }
    button { padding:6px 12px; margin-top:5px; }
    select { padding:4px; margin-bottom:10px; }
</style>


</html>

&lt;script&gt;
const CURRENT_ITERATION = 15;
const LOGGING_ACTIVE = true;
&lt;/script&gt;

&lt;script&gt;
let lastIteration = CURRENT_ITERATION;

// Poll every 2 seconds
if (LOGGING_ACTIVE) {
    setInterval(async () =&gt; {
        try {
            const res = await fetch(&#039;iteration_logic/logger_iteration_status.php&#039;, {
                cache: &#039;no-store&#039;
            });
            const data = await res.json();

            if (data.iteration &gt; lastIteration) {
                window.location.href =
                    &#039;/logger/logger_index.php?iteration=&#039; + data.iteration;
            }
        } catch (e) {
            // silently ignore
        }
    }, 2000);
}
&lt;/script&gt;
&lt;script&gt;
document.addEventListener(&#039;DOMContentLoaded&#039;, () =&gt; {
    const selected = &quot;&quot;;
    if (selected) {
        filterRemarks(selected);
    }
});
&lt;/script&gt;

&lt;/body&gt;

<script>
function filterRemarks(iterationId) {
    document.querySelectorAll('.remark-item').forEach(el => {
        el.style.display =
            el.dataset.iteration === iterationId ? 'block' : 'none';
    });
}
</script>
